ModMetaData.name: Expanded Materials-Concrete Barricade
ModMetaData.author: Uaine Teine
ModMetaData.description:
mv0.0.1
Why stand around a drill all day? You've got better things to do! Automated drills!
Speed based on a lv10 miner. Output yield scales with vanilla difficulty.
Basic AutoDrill - standard size bore (2 radius, 3x3) - average drill cycle of 5.5 hours - 80% deposit consumption - 80% resource output
